question.title: Java WildCard list to Specific JavaList
question.body:
I am working on a fileReader Utility. I am facing some challenge in type casting. I have a List as below

Class classType= getClassType("");
List<?> list= reader.read(file,classType);

This is the code I am having, I want to convert the list of ? into type classType as below

List<classType> list;

I am providing class type at runtime to my reader and it is converting the data into classtype format.
